name: Adni
long_description:
Healthcare workers use Adni to autonomously find jobs, buy gear, connect with peers, manage credentials, and more. Leading organizations, like Penn Medicine, MedPro, and PRN Healthcare, use Adniâ€™s clinician network and AI voice agents to source, screen, and engage healthcare talent faster and cheaper.

Backed by Y Combinator, Flare Capital, Liquid 2 Ventures, Fresco Capital, Augment Ventures, Crista Galli Ventures, and more.
one_liner: AI career platform for healthcare workers
